title: Bifurcate Array Based on Values
description: In this lab, we will explore how to bifurcate an array based on given values using JavaScript. The lab will demonstrate how to use the Array.prototype.reduce() method and Array.prototype.push() method to add elements to two groups, based on a given filter. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to manipulate arrays in JavaScript.

meta.title: Bifurcate Array Based on Values
meta.description: Learn how to split an array into two groups based on given values using JavaScript's Array.prototype.reduce() and Array.prototype.push() methods.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, array manipulation, javascript practice online, array prototype push, javascript lab, array prototype reduce, array bifurcation, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
